title: Valhalla Knight armor
summaries: Valhalla Knight armor is a Hardmode armor set purchased from the Tavernkeep for 1500000*150 [img:Defender Medal] in total, after Golem has been defeated. The set consists of the Valhalla Knight's Helm, Valhalla Knight's Breastplate and Valhalla Knight's Greaves.
A full set of Valhalla Knight armor provides the following benefits:

• +68 defense
  • +10% melee damage
  • +20% melee critical strike chance
  • +60% summon damage
  • +3 sentry slots
  • +20% movement speed
  • +4 HP/second health regeneration

Additionally, wearing the full set will increase the velocity of the <linked>Ballista</linked> sentries' projectiles, will greatly increase their fire rate, and will increase the maximum number of enemies that can be pierced by them from 3 to 6. It also grants the wearer the <linked>Ballista Panic!</linked> <linked>buff</linked> upon taking any damage, which further increases the fire rate of all Ballista sentries summoned by the player for 5 seconds.
The Valhalla Knight armor set is an upgrade of the <linked>Squire armor</linked> set.
